import{useRef,useState,useEffect}from"react";import DropSlot from"./DropSlot";import"./OcrSlot.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function OCRSlot(_ref){let{isMain}=_ref;const boxRef=useRef(null);const[imageURL,setImageURL]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const handlePaste=e=>{const items=e.clipboardData.items;for(const item of items){if(item.type.indexOf("image")!==-1){const file=item.getAsFile();const url=URL.createObjectURL(file);setImageURL(url);e.preventDefault();// 브라우저 기본 삽입 방지
